Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Deck is 52 unique card objects, 13 in each of clubs, spades hearts, and diamonds (no duplicates). It is able to deal and shuffle the deck. 1 is ace, 13 is king.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck(int screenRes)
      Deck constructor creates a new array list of 52 unique cards, just like a playing card deck, and shuffles them in a random order.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hand dealHand()
      Creates a new hand and adds thirteen new cards to it, starting where the index is.
      void shuffle()
      shuffles the order of the deck using Collection's shuffle method
      java.lang.String toString()
      Prints out every card in the deck, used primarily for testing purposes

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck(int screenRes)
        Deck constructor creates a new array list of 52 unique cards, just like a playing card deck, and shuffles them in a random order.
        Parameters:
        screenRes - The screen resolution of the Cards in the deck.

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        shuffles the order of the deck using Collection's shuffle method

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Prints out every card in the deck, used primarily for testing purposes
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Every card in the deck.

      • dealHand

        public Hand dealHand()
        Creates a new hand and adds thirteen new cards to it, starting where the index is.
        Returns:
        A new hand with thirteen cards in it
